Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, special "looking ahead" discussion, with Andy Humm, Joyce Hunter, and Darrell Yates Rist2. Expecting AIDS statistics continuing to rise, especially among heterosexual couples3. Expected AIDS funding, or lack there of, from the Reagan administration4. Possible cures and vaccines for AIDSCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine5. Condom ads on network television?6. Closeted or out attitudes of gay persons in 19877. Funding for lesbian and gay services8. Progression or overturning of sodomy laws9. March on Washington DC10. Guests answer questions, "If you could change one thing for gay people this year, what would it be?" and "Do you think Ronald Reagan is going to be in office at the end of this year?"COMMERCIAL: "Gay Year in Review" VHS tape11. Andy Humm on letter-writing to politiciansCOMMERCIAL: Stamp Out AIDS featuring Jennifer Bassey12. San Francisco organization, Mobilization Against AIDS, plans to launch a national boycott of Delta Airlines for its gay rights violations13. Committee of Interns and Residents votes to refuse to hold conventions in states with sodomy laws14. Amsterdam, plan to build monument to memory of homosexuals killed by the Nazis in World War II15. Georgia, in first ruling since passage of sodomy laws, two men were fined and given community service for committing sodomy16. Sacramento, council members tried to overturn the city's gay rights bill17. Boston, Beth Israel Hospital employee fired for not working with AIDS patients, attempts to get unemployment benefits18. Sports Report, interview with Ron Keel of the Manhattan Community Athletic Association about getting gay persons involved in activities19. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, Stephen Holden's NY Times review of comedy act Barb Nelson's negative stereotypes2. Interview with playwright Robert Patrick of "Blue is for Boys," and actors Allan Gassman and David GallagherCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine3. Show Bits with George Trahanis, review of "Pageant" the satirical drag show-themed musicalCOMMERCIAL: The Monster4. Interview with a furrier from New York's Zamir Furs about maintenance and type of fur coats for men5. Christmas message from GCN San Francisco to GCN New York6. And Another Thing... with Brett Siereveld on having pride as a gay personCOMMERCIAL: Zamir furs7. Closing credits over coverage of a bowling event
